object_name: Coastal waters with offshore wind farm
background_description: The image depicts a wide expanse of coastal waters under a clear, pale blue sky. In the foreground, the water is a murky reddish-brown, indicative of shallow, possibly muddy or sandy, conditions, with subtle surface ripples. A red and dark grey marker buoy stands in this foreground water. Towards the midground, the water transitions to a darker, more grey-blue hue, meeting the horizon line. Stretching across the distant horizon are numerous white offshore wind turbines, appearing somewhat hazy and blended with the sky due to distance.
explanation: The image solely depicts an environmental scene consisting of coastal waters, sky, and man-made offshore wind turbines. There are no visible organisms (animals, insects, or fish) present in the frame. Therefore, camouflage is not applicable and not detected in this image.
